019package org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022
023import java.io.Serial;
024import java.time.YearMonth;
025import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
026import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
027import java.util.Optional;
028
029import org.apiguardian.api.API;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
031
032/**
033 *  The implementation of
034 *  {@link TimeDateStringConverter}
035 *  for {@code java.time.YearMonth}.
036 *
037 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @version $Id: YearMonthStringConverter.java 1125 2024-03-22 15:34:01Z tquadrat $
039 *  @since 0.0.6
040 *
041 *  @UMLGraph.link
042 */
043@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: YearMonthStringConverter.java 1125 2024-03-22 15:34:01Z tquadrat $" )
044@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.6" )
045public class YearMonthStringConverter extends TimeDateStringConverter<YearMonth>
046{
047        /*------------------------*\
048    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
049        \*------------------------*/
050    /**
051     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
052     *
053     *  @hidden
054     */
055    @Serial
056    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
057
058    /**
059     *  An instance of this class.
060     */
061    public static final YearMonthStringConverter INSTANCE = new YearMonthStringConverter();
062
063        /*--------------*\
064    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
065        \*--------------*/
066    /**
067     *  Creates a new {@code YearMonthStringConverter} instance.
068     */
069    public YearMonthStringConverter() { super( YearMonth.class ); }
070
071    /**
072     *  Creates a new {@code YearMonthStringConverter} instance.
073     *
074     *  @note The formatter may not drop neither year nor month, otherwise
075     *      {@code fromString()} may fail. This means that the formatter is
076     *      only allowed to re-order the temporal fields.
077     *
078     *  @param  formatter   The formatter for the temporal accessor.
079     */
080    public YearMonthStringConverter( final DateTimeFormatter formatter )
081    {
082        super( YearMonth.class, formatter );
083    }   //  YearMonthStringConverter()
084
085        /*---------*\
086    ====** Methods **==========================================================
087        \*---------*/
088    /**
089     *  {@inheritDoc}
090     */
091    @Override
092    protected final YearMonth parseDateTime( final CharSequence source, final Optional<DateTimeFormatter> formatter ) throws DateTimeParseException
093    {
094        final var retValue = formatter.map( dateTimeFormatter -> YearMonth.parse( source, dateTimeFormatter ) ).orElse( YearMonth.parse( source ) );
095
096        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
097        return retValue;
098    }   //  parseDateTime()
099
100    /**
101     *  This method is used by the
102     *  {@link java.util.ServiceLoader}
103     *  to obtain the instance for this
104     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter}
105     *  implementation.
106     *
107     *  @return The instance for this {@code StringConverter} implementation.
108     */
109    public static final YearMonthStringConverter provider() { return INSTANCE; }
110}
111//  class YearMonthStringConverter
112
113/*
114 *  End of File
115 */
